name: Misc-dev
tagline: An undefined collection of classical texts and resources in TEI or EpiDoc formats.
body:
#Welcome to misc-dev!

This repository contains miscellaneous classical texts encoded in TEI P5 or EpiDoc formats. The files are encoded by the _Open Greek and Latin_ [research team](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/projects/open-greek-and-latin-project/) (researchers and student assistants).
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents
###Lexica
* Karl Ernst Georges (1910) _Kleines deutsch-lateinisches Handw√∂rterbuch_. Hannover und Leipzig: Hahnsche Buchhandlung.
 * [Part 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/misc-dev/blob/master/Georges_Handwoerterbuch_1910_PART1.xml)
 * [Part 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/misc-dev/blob/master/Georges_Handwoerterbuch_1910_PART2.xml)
 * [Part 3](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/misc-dev/blob/master/Georges_Handwoerterbuch_1910_PART3.xml)

###Editions with facing translation
Each file contains both the source text and the translation but not in sequence. The source text appears at the top of the file whilst the translation can be viewed at the bottom. Any issues with the files are documented as sub-bullets.

* Cicero, _Ad C. Herennium de ratione dicendi_ (_Rhetorica ad Herennium_), with an English translation by Harry Caplan (1964) London: William Heinemann; Cambridge, Mass.: Harvard University Press.
 * Apparatus criticus starting from page ? is missing (to be entered manually)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
